Class ManageEmployee

  • java.lang.Object
    • company.main.associationmappings.unidirectional.many_to_one.ManageEmployee

  • public class ManageEmployee
extends java.lang.Object

    Unidirectional. many-to-one

    |id | |firstName | n:1 |street | |lastName | ( many-to-one |city | |salary | unidirectional) |state | |address --|------------/ |zipcode | ---------- --------- / \ / ▲ \ |Hibernate| \ ▼ / \ / EMPLOYEE_MANY_TO_ONE ADDRESS ------------------ 1 ----------------- │PK id (pk,auto) │ /---->│PK id(pk,auto) │ │ first_name │ / │ street_name │ │ last_name │ / │ city_name │ │ salary │ n / │ state_name │ │FK address(fk,nn)│----->>---/ │ zipcode │ ------------------ ----------------- This class contains the employee detail. This class contains the address detail. -->
